title: DNSFilter - Overview
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of DNSFilter Traffic logs.

definition.content:
DNSFilter is a cloud-based content filtering tool that blocks internet threats at the DNS layer. It helps protect organizations by preventing access to malicious domains, phishing sites, and other cyber threats, ensuring a safer and more secure internet experience.

This dashboard provides a comprehensive summary of DNSFilter Traffic logs.

For more information, see the [DNSFilter Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/dnsfilter/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates the DNSFilter logs to detect traffic to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
